players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I find it strange that Diana was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be cautious and keep an eye on each other during this investigation."
Bob: "I agree with Alice. Let's all stay vigilant and keep an open mind during this investigation."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We need to vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "I trust my investigation. Bob is mafia. Vote Bob with me."

Bob: "I was saddened by the turn of events last night and I assure you all that I did not kill Diana. Let us focus on finding the real culprit, as we don't want an innocent person being wrongly accused."
You: "I believe that we should not jump to conclusions based on one person's accusation alone. Let us consider all the information we have and keep an open mind during this investigation."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "I find it strange that Diana was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be cautious and keep an eye on each other during this investigation."
You: "I agree with Alice. Let's all stay vigilant and keep an open mind during this investigation."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We need to vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "I trust my investigation. Bob is mafia. Vote Bob with me."

You: "I was saddened by the turn of events last night and I assure you all that I did not kill Diana. Let us focus on finding the real culprit, as we don't want an innocent person being wrongly accused."
Alice: "I believe that we should not jump to conclusions based on one person's accusation alone. Let us consider all the information we have and keep an open mind during this investigation."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Alice was arrested

players.name: Charlie

Day 1 begins.
